TextView.android:text: Hello, my name is Marzhan and I'm 20 years old. This summer, I'm participating in the Work and Travel program. I'm a third-year student at an international IT university, majoring in Cybersecurity, and I plan to pursue a career in the IT field because I have a lot of experience in this area. In addition to my studies, I've tried myself in various professions: I worked as a cashier in a grocery store for 2 years, as a social media manager for about 3 years, and as a camp counselor. I'm a versatile person, so besides work, I have many hobbies, and my main passion since childhood is dancing. I'm passionate about various dance genres, but I particularly enjoy high heels, hip-hop, and waacking. I'm very energetic, so dancing helps me stay fit and keep my body in shape. The reason I want to spend my summer in America is because I love American performers and would like to attend their concerts! I've also watched many series and movies where I've always been amazed by the beauty of big cities. I really want to see them in person! As for my soft and hard skills: I have highly developed communication skills, I quickly solve problems when they arise, and I integrate well into any team when working collaboratively! I will be a glad to become a part of the wonderful cultive to bring and that to get that benefit from this new work to from this new experience in my life.
